_header: Be true and hold that thee have hight
_description: To his mistress — four 8-line stanzas with refrain

NLWPork10.First Lines:
Be trewe and hold that ye haue hyȝteþe haue my
                    louys…
NLWPork10.Editions:
Kurvinen,  Auvo. 
             “MS. Porkington 10. Description with Extracts.” 
             Neuphilologische Mitteilungen
         54 (1953): 33-67: 52-3.
